[id="UpdateComplianceScanConfiguration_{context}"]
= UpdateComplianceScanConfiguration

:toc: macro
:toc-title:

toc::[]


`PUT /v2/compliance/scan/configurations/{id}`

UpdateComplianceScanConfiguration updates a compliance scan configuration

== Description







== Parameters

|

| null
|

| X
|
